dcterms:creator: John S Garofolo
Lori F Lamel
William M Fisher
Jonathon G Fiscus
David S Pallett
Nancy Dahlgren
Victor Zue
dcterms:description: TIMIT includes accurate time-aligned phonetic transcriptions, meaning that both phonetic labels and their start/end times are known. The dataset is used for clustering speech segments corresponding to triphones.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:creator: M. Lichman
dcterms:description: SADD consists of 8800 utterances already parametrised as 13-dimensional MFCCs, spoken by 44 male and 44 female Arabic speakers. Each utterance corresponds to a single Arabic digit.
dcterms:title: Spoken Arabic Digit Dataset (SADD)

dcterms:description: TIMIT SI and SX triphones are used for clustering experiments, representing subsets of speech segments drawn from the TIMIT training set.
dcterms:title: TIMIT SI and SX triphones
